MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hey, are you free right now?
Would you like to join me for a little training?

Oculus came to my office asking me to join her in her training.
I'd be happy to, but just what brought her here to ask me that?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Well, you know I'm pretty restless.
I'm just not good at sitting still and doing nothing.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The other day, during a hide and seek exercise, I got chastised by Instructor Finchley for being too restless. She said I was almost killed during training, and if it was a real battle, I'd be dead.
Yeah, that sounds like Finchley.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
There's still so much I don't know about the world and I can't die, right?
Can't I settle down later? That's what I thought to myself.
That's a good point.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Right? Conductor, do you know what zazen is?
It's a mental training method used by the people of Nishiki.

Zazen? I only know the name.
I didn't realize you knew a lot about it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Of course! Just by mastering the zazen, you become able to hit a hundred targets with your bow, double the power of your magic, have smooth skin, and double your salary!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't you think that's the perfect training for me right now?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The problem is that I've never actually done it before.
So, are you willing to help me out?

All right. I'd like to try out this zazen. If it seems to be effective,
it would be good to adopt it as part of the training menu for the SSS.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I'm talking about! I've done all the research on how to do it, so let's get started!

Thus began the zazen class with
Oculus in the office in the late afternoon.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
First, you sit on the floor with your legs crossed. That's right. Just relax.
I want you to close your eyes and empty your mind.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
And then I sit on your lap, OK?
Here I go.
Huh!? W-wait a second! Is this really part of zazen?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right. Now don't move. You have to focus on your nerves.

But Oculus' soft body is coming directly into contact with me.
I don't know what I can say, but this is not calming me down at all.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's in situations like this that your mental strength is tested.
Come on, I'm going to focus too, so keep quiet.

Err, alright. So this is training too, huh?Well then...
Err....

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Pft, hahahaha!
Don't move! You're tickling me!
No, you're the one who's moving.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No, no, this is impossible. The more I focus, the more I can feel your body heat and it makes me nervous.

Training that is meant to calm you down shouldn't be making you nervous.
It was you who suggested we do this in the first place.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I know, OK. I'm going to focus this time, so sit down again. Alright, let's go!

Oculus sits down on my lap and begins to meditate.
I think I can properly focus this time.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Zzzz....
Hey! Don't fall asleep!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh!? I wasn't sleeping!
Hey, is this really what zazen is all about?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah... This has gotta be right! I mean, I think...
You didn't do enough research, did you?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You could say that...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Anyway, it turns out that this zazen thing is not for me. Let's count this discovery as a big step forward!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm going to find a better training program for me.
Once I do, will you help me out again?

I will. I can't disregard the ambitions of my troops.
But this time, you'd better research how to do whatever it is properly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Oculus
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Gotcha!
I'll let you know as soon as I've figured it out!

After saying that, Oculus left the office,
brimming with a sense of determination.
It's good to be ambitious, but we'll see what happens...
